```{r}
library(ipumsr)
ddi <- read_ipums_ddi("atus_00001.xml")
data <- read_ipums_micro(ddi)
```

```{r}
mod1 <- lm(WBLADDER~Sleeping_time, data = data)
summary(mod1)
```
